TopicTitle: Game Asset's Load Faster With Mods?!

Articles.Content:
My assets load so slow on vanilla but when i install mods, It loads super fast...Eh, What?

Win7

KSP .23

Did you install the active memory reduction mod? I'm not well versed on what it does but I know it reduces the amount or RAM assets take up and it does that compression during loading. I don't know if that helps load times at all.
No i had it, But it was making my HUD Dissapear so it's gone now. And it's been gone.
